Multiple social media users shared a vid: Modi Modi' were raised in the Pakistani parliament.
The video was shared by Maj Gen Harsha K: Retd.), who stated that it showed Pakistani Foreign Minister SM Qureshi feeling insulted.
BJP Delhi general secretary Kuljeet Sing: questioning why the Modi chants were happening in the Pakistani assembly.
India TV broadcasted a report in which e: in-chief Rajat Sharma confirmed that slogans of 'Modi-Modi' were chanted in the Pakistani parliament, with one slogan stating, "The one who is a friend of Modi is a foe of Pakistan."
